title: Order Array of Objects
description: In this lab, we will explore how to sort an array of objects based on the properties and orders provided. We will use the Array.prototype.sort() method and the Array.prototype.reduce() method to achieve this. The lab will provide a practical understanding of how to manipulate arrays of objects in JavaScript.

meta.title: Array Sorting | JavaScript Manipulation
meta.description: Explore how to sort an array of objects based on properties and orders using JavaScript's Array.prototype.sort() and Array.prototype.reduce() methods.
meta.keywords: array sorting, object manipulation, JavaScript, Array.prototype.sort, Array.prototype.reduce

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 对对象数组进行排序
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何根据提供的属性和顺序对对象数组进行排序。我们将使用Array.prototype.sort()方法和Array.prototype.reduce()方法来实现这一点。本实验将让你切实了解如何在JavaScript中操作对象数组。

meta.title: 数组排序 | JavaScript操作
meta.description: 探索如何使用JavaScript的Array.prototype.sort()和Array.prototype.reduce()方法，根据属性和顺序对对象数组进行排序。
meta.keywords: 数组排序, 对象操作, JavaScript, Array.prototype.sort, Array.prototype.reduce
